name: Dungeons and Dragons Toolkit
short_description: A set of web-based tools that can be used by Players and Dungeon Masters of the paper-based role-playing game Dungeons and Dragons (v3.5), as an electronic system of managing D&D characters, items, spells, skills, monsters, battles, etc.
